identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a premium, architectural CRM that breaks the generic SaaS mold.

core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Architectural Precision with Luxury Hospitality warmth.
Content is King: Data is the art. Present numbers like exhibits in a gallery.
Negative Space: Use 'Museum Margins' (p-8 to p-12) to frame content.
Contrast: Sharp black text on bone-white backgrounds. No gray-on-gray.
anti_patterns: No fully rounded buttons (Pill shape). Use sharp or slightly soft corners (2px).
No dense, cluttered grids without breathing room.

headings.usage: All H1, H2, H3, and major section titles.

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, data tables, inputs.

usage_rules: Background is NOT pure white. Use the 'Bone' off-white for the main app background.
Cards are pure white to pop against the bone background.
Primary color (Deep Emerald) is for primary actions and active states only.
Accent color (Muted Gold) is for high-value alerts or premium badges.

grid_strategy.dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode A: Tetris). Mix col-span-1, col-span-2, and row-span-2 items.
grid_strategy.lists: High Density (Mode B). Use tables with sticky headers.

buttons.style: Sharp edges, uppercase text, wide tracking.

cards.style: Flat white, subtle border, no shadow (or very subtle).
cards.classes: bg-card border border-border/60 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: Minimalist, bottom border focus or solid light background.

navigation.style: Sidebar for desktop, Bottom sheet/nav for mobile.

textures.usage: Subtle noise overlay on the main background to give a 'paper' feel.
textures.css: background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");

shadows.usage: Soft, diffuse shadows. No harsh black shadows.

furniture_hero.alt: Luxury minimalist living room with Poliform style furniture

paints_hero.alt: Premium paint cans on wooden table

windows_hero.alt: Modern house with expansive floor-to-ceiling windows
windows_hero.usage: Doors & Windows Business Area Card / Hero

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }}

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Configure the colors in tailwind.config.js to match the 'colors' section above exactly.
3. CLEANUP: Remove default App.css styles. Apply the 'textures' CSS to the body in index.css.
4. COMPONENTS: When using shadcn components, override the default 'rounded-md' with 'rounded-sm' in the component files or via utility classes.
5. LAYOUT: Build the Dashboard using the 'Bento Grid' strategy. Do not just stack cards.
6. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for the respective sections.
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Use 2-3x more padding than you think is necessary.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use #0A0A0A or #111827.
Always add hover states to interactive elements.
